name: The Repairing
description:
This game was made for Global Game Jam 2020

A short story of a nice Sunday morning that gets interrupted by an annoyingly persistent door to door salesman. Defend your home from a dodgy cell phone plan and minor social interactions by repairing your door as it gets broken down.
Use left click to gather resources and right click to drop them, move around with WASD and jump with spacebar. Good luck with your Finnish way of life!
